0: WASHINGTON (CBSLA.com/AP) — President Barack Obama has been brought up to date on the shooting at a San Bernardino social services center. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The White House says he was briefed by his homeland security adviser, Lisa Monaco, and has asked to be kept informed as the situation develops. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR In an interview with CBS News, Obama said, “We have a pattern now of mass shootings in the country that has no parallel anywhere else in the world.” NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Authorities say multiple people were shot Wednesday at the Inland Regional Center in San Bernardino. Police were searching for one or more gunmen.
